page.title: 02TOURISM
page.content: Libanus village is in the Brecon Beacon National Park.It is an area of out standing natural beauty and is a conservation area.The Brecon Beacons mountain centre on Myndd Illtyd Common is a tourist information centre and also provides facilities for tourists, such as refreshments, car parking, toilet facilities.Guided walks are organised from there or visitors can leave their transport there and walk. The warden also gives talks on the area.Many of the farms and houses offer bed and breakfast accomodation for tourists.There is a motel in the village.
